body_html: The error there seems to be a little more restrictive than it is. An engine can run a smaller batch size than it is built for, but with less efficiency than it could if it was built for that batch size. However it can not run a batch size bigger than it is built for so it is not really wrong. We are going to change these code soon for other reasons and I will update the logic there then.

body: The error there seems to be a little more restrictive than it is. An engine can run a smaller batch size than it is built for, but with less efficiency than it could if it was built for that batch size. However it can not run a batch size bigger than it is built for so it is not really wrong. We are going to change these code soon for other reasons and I will update the logic there then.
